channel.title: Who is your favorite enemy from all of the Half-Life series?
channel.description:
I'd have to say mine is probably that weird underwater monster... Forgot it's name.
But anyways, it scared the shit out of me the first time I saw that fast fuck.

item.title: Who is your favorite enemy from all of the Half-Life series?
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
My personal fav is the panthereye thing that never made it into half life, but still gets used in a few of the mods. For Half Life 2, I’d have to go with the Hunters; small enough to get you no matter where you hide, but big and nasty enough to make your life hell.

Read full topic
item.source: Who is your favorite enemy from all of the Half-Life series?

item.description:
